resources.name: Fear is the Mindkiller - Kaja Sadowski
resources.description: Excellent book on building safe, inclusing and effective training spaces in martial arts.  Great resource whether you are an instructor/organizer or just looking for guidance in structuring your own training.

resources.name: The Theory and Practice of Historical Martial Arts - Guy Windsor
resources.description: Overview of studying historical martial arts, including instruction on working with historical manuals, skill development, safety and putting together training groups and classes.
